name: Froggy Friday; Leap into love!
description:
Summary

A Froggy Dating sim where you can live out your Amphibious dreams... 

You've woken up as a frog! You've joked about it in the past, but you never truly believed it would happen... Now you must use the state-of-the-art dating app, 'Toader', for Frogs like yourself. Search for your 'Frogmate' in order to reinstate your bipedal lifestyle. Make your leap into love!

Meet a range of charming Frogs and Toads and enjoy dates in their favourite locations, and be careful not to say the wrong thing!

Sadly for time we had to cut Carfungle and Mateo from the app for now. Expect these froggy singles to appear in a location near you soon in a future update! 

Now available on Itch.io! Made as part of Jamfuzer.

Game Controls: Select Option/ButtonLeft Mouse ButtonProgress TextSpace BarOptions MenuEscape Button Social Media for the Game:

Twitter- https://twitter.com/Froggy_Friday

Instagram- https://www.instagram.com/froggy_friday/?hl=en
